parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description:
Th language of the `LocalName` response parameter. Valid values:

*   **zh-CN**: Chinese.
*   **en-US**: English.
*   **ja**: Japanese.

> If you do not specify this parameter, the Chinese language is used.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~612293~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
